matrix
Class CDSMat

java.lang.Object
  matrix.Mat
      matrix.SMat
          matrix.CDSMat

public class CDSMat
extends SMat

Class for compressed-diagonal-storage-square sparse matrix (CDS). Can be used for iterative solvers. This class uses an external library called "MTJ".

Author:
Murat Artim
